title: Belonging nowhere
description: A charming ‘feel good’ novel like a breath of fresh mountain air! Switzerland provides the colourful background to this bright and captivating story about Sylvie and the challenges which force her to identify the things that really matter to her. What does it take to feel ‘at home’? Elegantly written by the author of Everything as it should be, this romantic adventure has characters that feel real, insights into life in Switzerland and entertaining touches of humour.
author: Susan  Meredith
